content: maze mitts lace mitts 1 universal size adjusted by gauge designed by anna zhuravleva © anna zhuravleva 2020 for personal use only page 1 materials yarn any dk weight yarn to match the gauge ~ 125 m per 50 g it is better to use solid colored yarn for this pattern yardage 50 g ~125 m yarn ideas  lana gatto supersoft  bbb premiere  infinity merino extrafine  lains du nord mercerized merino needles notions - us 3-3 5 3 5 - 4 mm dpns - 2 stitch markers - a hook size 3 0 to pick up stitches - darning needle - waste yarn gauge and size size s m l palm circumference 6 5 7 7 5 stitches in 4 10 cm 24 22 20 glossary  st s stitch es  m1r - insert the left needle from  r round back to front into the horizontal  m marker strand between the last stitch worked  k knit and the first stitch on the left needle  p - purl knit this strand through the front  yo yarn over loop to twist it  k2tog knit 2 sts together  m1l insert the left needle from  ssk slip 1 st knit-wise slip 1 st front to back into the horizontal knit-wise knit these 2 sts together strand between the last stitch worked through the back loop and the first stitch on the left needle knit this strand through the back loop to twist it © anna zhuravleva 2020 for personal use only page 2 beginning both mitts cast on 38 st with long tail cast on join in round making sure not to twist the stitches work 6 rounds of 1*1 rib k1 p1 knit 2 rounds plain r 9-20 k2 work next 16 sts using the pattern below k20 now you worked 1 full repeat the cart is read bottom up from right to left only odd row are indicated all even row knit all sts chart symbols empty cell - knit - k2tog o - yarn over - ssk thumb gusset left mitt r21 k2 work 16 sts using the pattern k18 m1r place m1 k2 r22 knit all sts repeat r21-22 11 more times working front part according to the pattern you will work 2 full repeats in row and making the increases each odd round before the m1 r43 k2 work 16 sts using the pattern k20 remove m1 place next 10 sts on a piece of the waste yarn k2 right mitt r21 k2 work 16 sts using the pattern k4 place m2 m1l k16 r22 knit all sts repeat r21-22 11 more times working front part according to the pattern you will work 2 full repeats in row and making the increases each odd round after the m2 r43 k2 work 16 sts using the pattern k4 remove m2 place next 10 sts on a piece of the waste yarn k18 © anna zhuravleva 2020 for
